originalText.text: On July 26, 2019, at 13:09, I used to have bike fittings with John Beardsley. He was patient in adjusting my fitting and understood my body's discomfort. His skills and knowledge are highly professional. After he completed my fitting, I didn't immediately leave a 5-star feedback for him. However, as of 2024, I have decided to give him the credit he deserves! Thank you, John! You are the best bike fitter!

originalText.text: Exceptional experience at EnduranceWerx. Obvious that Chad really knows his stuff and as a physician I felt like I was going to the "bike doctor", really took his time to figure out what my goals were and what I needed from a new bike fit. Was a cool and useful experience and he's been super responsive both before and after the visit. Was such a good experience I gifted my swim-coach a fitting!  Highest recommendation.

originalText.text: 10/10 - Incredible experience. I can’t recommend enduranceWERX enough!!!! If you need a bike fit, this is the place to come. I worked with John and he is incredibly knowledgeable. Not only did he improve my bike fit, he gave me some super helpful cues/tips to improve my riding experience and pedal stroke. He explained every part of the process while we went through it, and he helped me understand the changes we were making. His feedback was outstanding and the bike feels tons better already — can’t wait to pound some miles on this new setup!! Thanks for all the help John! And thanks to Chad for following up with me to help  get this scheduled!

And thanks to Chad for following up with me to help  get this scheduled!

originalText.text: Had a great fitting with John. This was not my first professional fitting, and I did not need to diagnose any particular problem, so it was a fairly efficient session. That being said, John's knowledge and his passion for all things related to cycling made it a genuinely fun experience.  The report was thorough and included suggestions for specific frame models and sizes from the leading manufacturers for the kind of bike I am looking for--the kind of objective information that you can get only from an independent fitter. The fitting resulted in several tweaks to my current setup, which I am eager to implement on my next bike. Although I haven't yet used it, the additional 30 minute consultation after the new bike arrives, included in the fitting fee, is a big value-add. Altogether, highly recommended!

originalText.text: Had a fantastic fit session at enduranceWERX – John was able to assess my current position and flexibility and expertly recommend adjustments to increase my efficiency on the bike. He thoroughly explained what we were seeing in the Retül system’s data capture, how that data paired with his own analysis and observations, and the reasoning behind each modification he suggested, ultimately checking that my position still felt comfortable and sustainable. The whole process was fun and engaging. On the road, I definitely notice my position is more naturally aero and I’m already feeling less muscle fatigue. Can’t wait to take this into the racing season – thanks so much, John!
